resources.string: The 2018 All-Star Game will be held in Esports Arena, Las Vegas, USA from December 6 to December 8. This year\'s All-Star competition system will be reformed in an all-round way, offering you three days of fast-paced competitive content, including the All-Star 1v1 elimination competition, charity 2v2 championship, competition area competition, East-West All-Star confrontation, mixed team alternative mode.
